name: Stupid Arrow - Unity3D Hypercasual Game - Ready For Release
name_original: Stupid Arrow - Unity3D Hypercasual Game - Ready For Release
description:
This game is a complete project template that is ready for release and has AdMob ads implemented. It is compatible for android, iOS, WebGL, PC and many other platforms.

You can test it here (WebGl): https://e-ugovor.rs/stupid_arrow/

Or download apk and test it on you android device: https://www.dropbox.com/s/rg1tq3ickerz6sy/stupid%20arrow%20test.apk?dl=1

Jump from circle to circle avoiding black areas.Game is endless and only goal is to score as much as you can. As it progress it becomes harder and harder.

Interstitial ads are implemented in this project. All you need to do is to:

  • Go to assets - google mobile ads - settings and put your app id there (you can find your app id in AdMob console).
  • Open "Menus.cs" script and put your interstitial ad id in "androidAdMobInterstitialID" and "iosAdmobInterstitialID" variables.

And that's it!

*NOTE: Ads will only show when you test it on real device. Inside Unity Editor you will only see logs.

Once you do that you can reskin it and publish it to play store, app store or any other store.
